abstract: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio announces that he is naming his wife Chirlane McCray as chairwoman of the Mayor's Fund to Advance New York City, nonprofit that raises money privately to support a variety of city causes.
lead_paragraph: Introducing her as “my best friend in the world, my closest confidante, my No. 1 adviser,” Mayor Bill de Blasio announced at a news conference that he was naming his wife, Chirlane McCray, the chairwoman of the Mayor’s Fund to Advance New York City.

headline.main: De Blasio Appoints Chirlane McCray, His Wife, to Lead Nonprofit Group
headline.print_headline: De Blasio Appoints ‘No. 1 Adviser’ to Nonprofit
